description: This file contains the SwiftUI implementation of the main user interface for a Tic Tac Toe game. It defines the ContentView structure with its visual layout, including game status, game board, and reset button, as well as the CellButton component for individual cells.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Defines the main view hierarchy including header, game board, and reset button.

methods.name: board
methods.description: Creates a grid of cells representing the Tic Tac Toe board using LazyVGrid, binding each cell to the ViewModel's state.
